name: Thrower champion
description:
WELCOME TO THE ARENA!

"Do you need money urgently, but you can't get a loan? THIS IS NOT A TROUBLE ANYMORE! because now you can just come to our battle arena, win and get FREE MONEY! But be prepared for the fact that it will not be easy to win, but do not worry, different types of artifacts will help you achieve your goal! 

Waves of enemies, unusual fighting style and a lot of fun are waiting for you right at 16 Ragron Cave southeast entrance.

WE ARE WAITING FOR YOU! And do not be afraid to participate, because everyone has chance to win! (entrance fee: 12 platinuzes)"

And with this flyer, you went straight to the right place.  You were full of hope for victory!

Thrower champion is an arcade roguelike arena with unusual combat system. Differents types of balls that falling on you will help fight off enemies! Various items can help you become stronger. You should not miss a single item, because the difficulty increases every few waves. You will have to rely on your luck and skills!

In this game you will find:   20 enemies! (There will be more of them in the future) 40 items!(There will be more of it in the future!!)   3 bosses!(THERE WILL BE MORE OF THEM IN THE FUTURE!!!)  1 Serpenta!!!(There can only be one perfect Serpenta) (Psst! I just wanted to say that some of the items can be impro-o-o-o-ved) And how can you play without fun? We have it too! CONTROL

WASD - movement

Arrow keys - throw a ball

I, E, H, Esc - action buttons. Which one is responsible for what is written in the game itself

And of course!

Press TAB to know your stats!
